attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am fully in support of Mr. Brown's statement of today - all strong personalities should  stay on board, when the ship hit stormy waters, and steer correctly, relentlessly, until we are on safe waters again. This is no time for 'novices' to dictate terms to a strong veteran like your good self. Please 'get on with the job' and we have have full confidence in you to 'do the job'.
May God Bless You.
I'm sure God helps people like you.
Eddie Mendis.
attributes.creator_name: Mr. Agampodi B E L Mendis

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
